autostart_description.description: Autostart setting description. Shown on the settings page.

autostart_title.description: Autostart section header. Shown on the settings page.

average_stat.description: Average Pomodoro completion stats label (abbreviated). Shown on the settings-history page.

battle_horn.description: Sound name. Shown in the audio notification dropdown in settings.

bell_ring.description: Sound name. Shown in the audio notification dropdown in settings.

bike_horn.description: Sound name. Shown in the audio notification dropdown in settings.

bpm.description: Beats per minute; speed unit for timer sound. Shown on the settings page.

browser_action_tooltip.description: Browser action tooltip format with title and text. Title is usually timer phase (break, focus) while text is usually timer status (time remaining, paused).

chrome_web_store_description.description: Detailed extension description shown to users in the Chrome Web Store.
chrome_web_store_description.message:
• Lange und kurze Pausen
• Toolbar Icon Countdown-Timer
• Pomodoro Verlauf & Statistiken
• Lange Pause Intervalle konfigurierbar
• Timer Dauer konfigurierbar
• Desktop & Tab Benachrichtigungen
• Audio Benachrichtigungen mit über 20 Tönen
• Tickende Timer Klänge
• Planbare Timer
• Open source software
